item.description:
Garbage are performing at the HOB on the North American leg of their World Tour. Doors open at 7pm, with IO Echo getting the show started at 8pm. I figured we could all meet up at The Lansdowne, just down the street from HOB, between 5.30-6pm, grab a few drinks (and food?), then get in line. There are still GA Floor tickets available on StubHub for as little as $11! (Those cheap tickets ARE legit, I called them to check!)

Even though they hail from my native Scotland, I've never seen them live. Rumor has it that they are quite fantastic live, and who wouldn't want to see Shirley Manson live?

Some Garbage tunes to check out:
Only Happy When It Rains - http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=esEdC0c3YI4
Stupid Girl - http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=1N29vkIT3eo
Blood For Poppies - http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=4OdTBCgqRt4
item.name: Garbage
